page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER
page.content: P.C. Dobson is the community Police officer for Whitnash a large residential area covering the two north western squares of our block.He is forty one and has been in the Police force for twenty one years.He has been responsible for Whitnash for twelve years and is based at Leamington Police Station About twenty years ago there was a Police Station at Whitnash but this was closed when Whitnash ceased to be a village and became a part of Leamington Spa P.C. Dobson holds twice monthly meetings with the people in the community centre but says there is very little crime in Whitnash-when there is it is mostly vandalism.He has a policy of avoiding arrests when a caution will do instead. He visits many local schools and is
